title: Attn High Geeks
author: VD
content_html: Today, you must genuflect before Markku, King of the Coders. In case you are interested, we have released the source code under the LGPLv3. And for the gamers, power CAD users, and Photoshop wizards, you have three more days to score the 20% discount.
content_text:
Today, you must genuflect before Markku, King of the Coders.  In case you are interested, we have
released the source code
under the LGPLv3.  And for the gamers, power CAD users, and Photoshop wizards, you have three more days to score
the 20% discount
